text: (Allah) phan: “Nay Adam! Nha nguoi cho (Thien Than) biet ten goi cua chung (van vat).” Boi the, khi (Adam) cho (Thien Than) biet ten goi cua chung (van vat), (Allah) phan: “Ha TA đa khong bao cho cac nguoi ro TA biet đieu vo hinh cua cac tang troi va trai đat va TA biet đieu cac nguoi tiet lo va giau giem hay sao?”
